meanings.definition: Demetons: a type of chemical compound used as a pesticide.
meanings.sent1: The demetons helped protect the plants from harmful bugs.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use demetons to keep insects away from their crops.
meanings.sent3: The demetons in the spray made the bugs run away in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: The demetons acted like a shield, guarding the plants from pests.
meanings.sent5: The demetons were like tiny warriors fighting off the insect invaders.

meanings.definition: Demetons: to apply demetons to a crop to control pests.
meanings.sent1: She demetons the fields every week to keep the bugs at bay.
meanings.sent2: Farmers demetons their crops regularly to ensure healthy growth.
meanings.sent3: He demetons the plants with a determined look on his face.
meanings.sent4: The act of demetonsing the fields felt like protecting a kingdom.
meanings.sent5: Demetonsing the crops was like casting a protective spell against pests.

meanings.definition: Demetons: a group of chemicals known for their insecticidal properties.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study demetons to understand their insect-killing abilities.
meanings.sent2: The demetons in the lab are highly effective against pests.
meanings.sent3: The demetons gathered together to form a powerful defense against bugs.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a blanket of demetons, ready to combat any insects.
meanings.sent5: The smell of demetons filled the air, signaling the bugs to stay away.
